address: Xã Tân Long, Huyện Phú Giáo, Tỉnh Bình Dương
thought:
**Finding the New Home for "Xã Tân Long"**

Okay, here's the breakdown of my thought process on this. First, I need to figure out the new administrative unit for "Xã Tân Long, Huyện Phú Giáo, Tỉnh Bình Dương." I immediately started by considering that Bình Dương might have merged or changed, based on my prior knowledge of the 60-NQ/TW resolutions.

Yep, and sure enough, Bình Dương is now part of Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, according to the resolutions. That's my crucial starting point. Now I only need to look at resolutions related to Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh.

I then started to search through the resolutions, looking for any mention of "Xã Tân Long" within the new province context, the old Bình Dương province. I found several resolutions mentioning "Xã Tân Long," but unfortunately, they all related to provinces other than Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Those were dead ends.

Finally, I hit the jackpot with Resolution 1685/NQ-UBTVQH15, which specifically deals with Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. I carefully examined the relevant lines. While the first few lines described new formations for surrounding wards, it was the final bit I wanted. Line 141 explicitly mentioned "Tân Long," saying it was merging with "An Linh" and "An Long" to form the new unit, **"xã An Long."**

So, from my assessment, it's clear: **"Xã Tân Long" is now part of "xã An Long" within Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh (formerly Bình Dương).** I can confidently say that's the new address.

citation.header: 60-NQ/TW: Các đơn vị hành chính cấp tỉnh mới sau sáp nhập, hợp nhất
citation.line: 16. Hợp nhất tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu, tỉnh Bình Dương và Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh; lấy tên là Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
